data.name: MinimizeInsteadOfTerminating
data.value: 응용 프로그램을 종료하는 대신 기본 창 최소화

data.name: PreferredProtocolWhenResolvingHostname
data.value: 호스트 이름을 확인할 때 선호하는 프로토콜:

data.name: ShowTheFollowingApplicationOnStartup
data.value: 시작할 때 다음 응용 프로그램을 표시:

data.name: Slogan
data.value: 네트워크를 관리하고 네트워크 문제를 해결하는 강력한 도구입니다!

data.name: TimeMSToWaitBetweenEachPing
data.value: Time (ms) to wait between each ping

data.name: CouldNotResolveHostnameFor
data.value: 다음에 대한 호스트 이름을 확인할 수 없습니다: "{0}"

data.name: ProfileEncryptionDisclaimer
data.value:
프로필 파일은 CBC 모드에서 키 크기 256비트, 블록 크기 128비트의 AES를 사용하여 디스크에서 암호화됩니다. 암호화 키는 1,000,000회 반복하는 Rfc2898DeriveBytes (PBKDF2)를 사용하는 마스터 암호에서 파생됩니다. 런타임에 프로필 파일이 로드되면 암호가 SecureString으로 저장됩니다. 일부 함수의 경우 암호를 일반 문자열로 변환해야 하며 가비지 수집기가 암호를 정리할 때까지 메모리에 암호화되지 않은 상태로 남아 있습니다.
암호화를 활성화하기 전에 먼저 프로필 파일의 백업 복사본을 만드십시오!

data.name: DecryptAndLoadCredentialsMessage
data.value: 자격 증명을 관리하려면 암호를 해독하고 불러와야 합니다.

data.name: EnableCredentialSecuritySupportProvider
data.value: 자격 증명 보안 지원 공급자 사용

data.name: EnterASubnetToCalculateItDots
data.value: Enter a subnet to calculate it...

data.name: EnterSubnetAndANewSubnetmaskToCreateSubnets
data.value: 서브넷과 새 서브넷 마스크를 입력하여 서브넷을 만듭니다...

data.name: ErrorCheckingApiGithubComVerifyYourNetworkConnection
data.value: 'api.github.com'에 연결할 수 없습니다. 네트워크 연결을 확인하십시오!

data.name: ErrorInResponseCheckIfYouHaveWritePermissions
data.value: 응답 오류! 쓰기 권한이 있는지 확인합니다.

data.name: FirstUsableIPAddress
data.value: 사용 가능한 첫 번째 IP 주소

data.name: NetworkLocationCannotBeReachedMessage
data.value: 네트워크 주소에 연결할 수 없습니다. 컴퓨터가 네트워크에 연결되어 있는지 확인합니다. 네트워크 문제 해결에 대한 자세한 내용은 Windows 도움말을 참조하십시오.

data.name: NoDNSRecordFoundCheckYourInputAndSettings
data.value: "{0}"에 대한 DNS 레코드를 찾을 수 없습니다! 입력 및 설정을 확인하십시오.

data.name: NoEnabledNetworkAdaptersFound
data.value: 사용하도록 설정된 네트워크 어댑터를 찾을 수 없습니다!

data.name: NoPortsFoundCheckYourInput
data.value: 포트를 찾을 수 없습니다. 입력 내용을 확인하십시오!

data.name: NoProfilesFoundCreateOne
data.value: 프로필을 찾을 수 없습니다! 하나 만들기...

data.name: NothingToDoCheckYourInput
data.value: 할 것이 없습니다. 입력 내용을 확인하십시오!

data.name: NoValidFileFoundToImport
data.value: 가져올 올바른 파일을 찾을 수 없습니다.

data.name: NoVendorFoundCheckYourInput
data.value: 공급업체를 찾을 수 없습니다. 입력 내용을 확인하십시오!

data.name: SearchedApplicationNotFound
data.value: 검색된 응용 프로그램을 찾을 수 없습니다!

data.name: SettingsFileFoundWasCorruptOrNotCompatibleMessage
data.value: 발견된 설정 파일이 손상되었거나 이 버전과 호환되지 않습니다. 모든 설정이 재설정되었습니다! (프로필에는 영향을 주지 않습니다!)

data.name: ShowUnreachableIPAddressesAndPorts
data.value: Show unreachable IP addresses and ports

data.name: TheApplicationCanBeStartedWithoutParameters
data.value: 매개 변수 없이 응용 프로그램을 시작할 수 있습니다!

data.name: TheFollowingHostnamesCouldNotBeResolved
data.value: 다음 호스트 이름을 확인할 수 없습니다:

data.name: TheProcessCanTakeUpSomeTimeAndResources
data.value: 프로세스에는 시간과 리소스 (CPU / RAM)가 다소 소요될 수 있습니다.

data.name: TimeoutOnSNMPQuery
data.value: Timeout on SNMP query. Maybe the host is not reachable or the community / password is wrong.

data.name: TimeoutWhenQueryingDNSServerMessage
data.value: IP 주소 "{0}"으로 DNS 서버를 쿼리할 때 시간이 초과되었습니다!

data.name: UseCurrentViewSize
data.value: 현재 보기 크기를 화면 크기로 사용

data.name: WrongPasswordDecryptionFailedMessage
data.value: 지정된 암호로 프로필 파일의 암호를 해독할 수 없습니다.

data.name: HelpMessage_PasswordNotDisplayedCanBeOverwritten
data.value: 편집할 때 암호는 표시되지 않지만 덮어쓸 수 있습니다.

data.name: HelpMessage_RDPAuthenticationLevel
data.value: [0] 서버 인증이 실패하면 경고 없이 컴퓨터에 연결합니다. [1] 서버 인증에 실패하면 연결을 설정하지 마십시오. [2] 서버 인증에 실패하면 경고를 표시하고 연결 또는 연결을 거부하도록 허용합니다. [3] 인증 요구사항이 지정되지 않았습니다.

data.name: HelpMessage_Tags
data.value: 태그는 프로필/ 항목별 프로필/프로젝트를 구성하는데 도움이 됩니다. 다중 태크는";"로 구분해서 사용할 수 있습니다. "tag=xxx"를 사용하여 태그로 검색합니다.

data.name: EnterValidSubnetmaskOrCIDR
data.value: CIDR의 유효한 서브넷 마스크를 입력하십시오 (255.255.255.0 또는 /24 같은)!

data.name: EnterOneOrMoreValidIPAddresses
data.value: 하나 이상의 유효한 IP 주소를 입력하십시오!

data.name: EnterValidHosts
data.value: 유효한 호스트를 입력하십시오 (여러 호스트는 ";"로 끝날 수 없습니다)!

data.name: EnterValidPortOrPortRange
data.value: 유효한 포트 및/또는 포트 범위를 입력하십시오 (1 - 65535)!

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_SslErrDelegationPolicy
data.value: 이 정책은 대상 서버에 대한 자격 증명 위임을 지원하지 않습니다.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_SslErrFreshCredRequiredByServer
data.value: 서버 인증 정책에서 저장된 자격 증명을 사용한 연결 요청을 허용하지 않습니다. 사용자는 새 자격 증명을 입력해야 합니다.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_SslErrNoAuthenticatingAuthority
data.value: 인증 기관에 연결할 수 없습니다. 인증 당사자의 도메인 이름이 잘못되었거나 도메인에 연결할 수 없거나 신뢰 관계 오류가 있을 수 있습니다.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_SslErrPasswordMustChange
data.value: 처음 로그온하기 전에 사용자 암호를 변경해야 합니다.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_SslErrPolicyNTLMOnly
data.value: 상호 인증이 이루어지지 않으면 대상 서버에 대한 자격 증명의 위임이 허용되지 않습니다.

data.name: AtLeastOneApplicationMustBeVisible
data.value: 하나 이상의 응용 프로그램이 표시되어야 합니다!

data.name: WhoisServerNotFoundForTheDomain
data.value: Whois 서버는 도메인에 대해 찾을 수 없습니다: "{0}"

data.name: DNSServerWithThisNameAlreadyExists
data.value: 같은 이름의 DNS 서버가 이미 있습니다!

data.name: AnErrorOccurredWhileExportingTheData
data.value: 데이터를 내보내는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다. 자세한 내용은 오류 메시지를 참조하십시오:

data.name: HelpMessage_BackgroundJob
data.value:
The background job will save settings and profiles every x-minutes.
Value 0 will disable this feature.
Changes to this value will take effect after restarting the application.

data.name: YourSystemOSIsIncompatibleWithTheLatestRelease
data.value: 시스템 OS가 최신 릴리스와 호환되지 않습니다!

data.name: AllSettingsCanBeChangedLaterInTheSettings
data.value: All settings can be changed later in the settings!

data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value:
Thank you for using NETworkManager!
If you like this tool, please leave a star on GitHub and recommend it to others.

data.name: HelpMessage_CheckForUpdatesAtStartup
data.value:
프로그램을 시작할 때 GitHub에서 새 프로그램 버전을 사용할 수 있는지 백그라운드에서 확인합니다.
URL: https://api.github.com/

data.name: HelpMessage_CheckPublicIPAddress
data.value:
공용 IP 주소는 ipify.org을 통해 결정됩니다.
URL: https://api.ipify.org/

data.name: ToolTip_HelpTranslateOnTransifex
data.value: Help translate the project on Transifex.

data.name: ToolTip_ContactOrContactMeViaX
data.value: Follow or contact me via X.

data.name: CheckNetworkAdapterConfigurationAndDNSServerConfigurationMessage
data.value: 네트워크 어댑터 구성 (dns)과 DNS 서버가 올바르게 구성되어 있는지 확인합니다.

data.name: CheckNetworkAdapterConfigurationAndNetworkConnectionMessage
data.value: 네트워크 어댑터 구성 (dhcp, 정적 IP)과 네트워크에 연결되어 있는지 확인합니다.

data.name: CouldNotDetectGatewayIPAddressMessage
data.value: 게이트웨이 IP 주소를 검색할 수 없습니다!

data.name: CouldNotDetectLocalIPAddressMessage
data.value: 로컬 IP 주소를 검색할 수 없습니다!

data.name: CouldNotGetPublicIPAddressFromXXXMessage
data.value: "{0}"에서 WebRequest(http/https)를 통해 공용 IP 주소를 가져올 수 없습니다! 네트워크 연결(방화벽, 프록시 등)을 확인합니다.

data.name: NoADNSRecordsResolvedForXXXMessage
data.value: "{0}"에 대해 해결된 A dns 레코드가 없습니다!

data.name: NoPTRDNSRecordResolvedForXXXMessage
data.value: "{0}"에 대해 해결된 PTR dns 레코드가 없습니다!

data.name: TCPIPStackIsAvailableMessage
data.value: TCP/IP 스택을 사용할 수 있습니다. ICMP를 통해 "{0}" 에 연결할 수 있습니다!

data.name: TCPIPStackIsNotAvailableMessage
data.value: TCP/IP 스택을 사용할 수 없습니다... ICMP를 통해 "{0}" 에 연결할 수 없습니다!

data.name: XXXIsNotReachableViaICMPMessage
data.value: ICMP를 통해 "{0}" 에 연결할 수 없습니다!

data.name: XXXIsReachableViaICMPMessage
data.value: ICMP를 통해 "{0}" 에 연결할 수 있습니다!

data.name: HelpMessage_CustomPublicIPv4AddressAPI
data.value: URL to a web service that can be reached via http or https and returns an IPv4 address like "xx.xx.xx.xx" as response.

data.name: CouldNotParsePublicIPAddressFromXXXMessage
data.value: "{0}"에서 공용 IP 주소를 구문 분석할 수 없습니다! 다른 서비스를 시도하거나 기본값을 사용합니다...

data.name: DeleteCustomCommandMessage
data.value: 선택한 사용자 지정 명령이 영구적으로 삭제됩니다.

data.name: HelpMessage_CustomCommandVariables
data.value:
다음 변수를 사용할 수 있습니다:
$$ipaddress$$ --> IP 주소 $$hostname$$ --> 호스트이름

data.name: WarningMessage_CouldNotResolveIPAddressForHostname
data.value: Could not resolve ip address for hostname!

data.name: DetectLocalIPAddressAndSubnetmask
data.value: 로컬 IP 주소 및 서브넷 마스크 탐지

data.name: IPAddressToDetectLocalIPAddressBasedOnRouting
data.value: 라우팅을 기반으로 로컬 IP 주소를 탐지하는 IP 주소

data.name: TimeInSecondsHowLongTheStatusWindowIsShown
data.value: Time in seconds how long the status window is shown

data.name: ToolTip_ReportIssueOrCreateFeatureRequest
data.value: Report an issue or create a feature request.

data.name: ClouldNotExportFileSeeErrorMessageXX
data.value: 파일을 내보낼 수 없습니다! 오류 메시지 참조: "{0}"

data.name: ClouldNotImportFileSeeErrorMessageXX
data.value: 파일을 가져올 수 없습니다! 오류 메시지 참조: "{0}"

data.name: LocationCannotBeChangedInThePortableVersion
data.value: 휴대용 버전에서는 위치를 변경할 수 없습니다!

data.name: ResetProfilesMessage
data.value: 이 프로필 파일의 모든 프로필이 영구적으로 삭제됩니다!

data.name: RestartTheApplicationToChangeTheLanguage
data.value: 언어를 변경하려면 응용 프로그램을 다시 시작합니다!

data.name: NetworkPacketsCaptureAdminMessage
data.value: 네트워크 패킷을 분석하려면 응용 프로그램을 상승된 권한으로 시작해야 합니다!

data.name: CaptureNetworkPacketsToViewLLDPorCDPInformation
data.value: LLDP 또는 CDP 정보를 보려면 네트워크 패킷을 캡처하십시오!

data.name: WebViewControlCertificateIsInvalidMessage
data.value: WebView 제어 (Microsoft Edge)는 잘못된 인증서가 있는 웹 사이트에 연결할 수 없습니다!

data.name: MicrosoftWindowsSDKContractsIsNotAvailable
data.value: 이 기능에 대해서는 Microsoft.Windows.SDK.Contracts가 필요하지만 이 시스템에서는 사용할 수 없습니다 (예: Windows 서버에서).

data.name: MicrosoftEdgeWebView2RuntimeIsNotAvailable
data.value: Microsoft Edge WebView2 Runtime을 사용할 수 없습니다!

data.name: ProfileFileCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: Profile file could not be loaded!

data.name: ProfileFileCouldNotBeLoadedMessage
data.value:
The profile file could not be loaded and may be corrupted. You can try to restore the file from a backup or delete it.
If this happens unexpectedly or after an update, please report the error on GitHub.
Error message: "{0}"

data.name: DecryptionErrorMessage
data.value: 파일의 암호를 해독할 수 없습니다. GitHub에서 이 문제를 보고할 수 있습니다.

data.name: EncryptionErrorMessage
data.value: 파일을 암호화할 수 없습니다. GitHub에서 이 문제를 보고할 수 있습니다.

data.name: UnlockTheProfileFileMessage
data.value: 프로필을 사용하려면 프로필 파일의 잠금을 해제하십시오!

data.name: Library_AirspaceFixer_Description
data.value: AirSpacePanel WPF 호스팅 WinForms의 모든 영공 문제를 해결합니다.

data.name: Library_ControlzEx_Description
data.value: WPF 등에 대한 공유 제어 및 ... 기타

data.name: Library_DnsClientNET_Description
data.value: DnsClient.NET는 단순하지만 매우 강력하고 .NET Framework에서 DNS 검색을 수행할 수 있는 고성능 오픈 소스 라이브러리

data.name: Library_Dragablz_Description
data.value: WPF를 위한 드래그 가능 및 찢어진 탭 제어

data.name: Library_IPNetwork_Description
data.value: C# 라이브러리는 복잡한 네트워크, IP, IPv4, IPv6, NetMask, CIDR, 서브넷, 서브넷, 슈퍼넷 및 .NET 개발자를 위한 슈퍼넷팅 계산을 처리합니다.

data.name: Library_LiveCharts_Description
data.value: 간편하고 유연하며 대화형 강력한 .Net용 차트, 지도 및 게이지

data.name: Library_MahAppsMetro_Description
data.value: 메트로 / 현대적인 UI 스타일의 WPF 앱을 만드는 툴킷입니다.

data.name: Library_NewtonsoftJson_Description
data.value: Json.NET는 널리 사용되는 .NET용 고성능 JSON 프레임워크입니다

data.name: Library_PSDicoveryProtocol_Description
data.value: 로컬 또는 원격 시스템에서 CDP 및 LLDP 패킷 캡처 및 구문 분석

data.name: Library_SharpSNMP_Description
data.value: Sharp SNMP 라이브러리 - .NET 및 Mono용 오픈 소스 SNMP

data.name: Resource_ListTLD_Description
data.value: 포트 43을 통해 whois.iana.org에서 TLD의 서버를 쿼리하는 데 사용되는 iana.org의 최상위 도메인 목록

data.name: Resource_ServiceNamePortNumber_Description
data.value: iana.org의 서비스 이름 및 전송 프로토콜 포트 번호 레지스트리

data.name: Library_CsWinRT_Description
data.value: C#/WinRT는 C# 언어에 대한 패키지 WinRT 예상 지원을 제공합니다.

data.name: Library_WebView2_Description
data.value: WebView2 컨트롤을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge (Chromium)에서 제공하는 기본 응용 프로그램에 웹 기술 (HTML, CSS 및 JavaScript)을 포함할 수 있습니다.

data.name: Library_XamlBehaviorsWpf_Description
data.value: WPF의 XAML 동작을 사용하여 앱에 상호 작용을 쉽게 추가할 수 있습니다.

data.name: WarningMessage_ProfileFileNotEncryptedStoringPasswords
data.value:
현재 프로파일 파일은 암호화되지 않고 암호가 디스크에 암호화되지 않은 상태로 저장됩니다!
설정> 프로파일에서 프로파일 파일 암호화를 사용하여 자격 증명을 안전하게 저장하십시오.

data.name: HelpMessage_PublicIPv4Address
data.value: Public IPv4 address reachable via ICMP.

data.name: HelpMessage_PublicIPv6Address
data.value: Public IPv6 address reachable via ICMP.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_TotalLoginTimeLimitReached
data.value: 총 로그인 시간 제한에 도달하여 원격 세션이 종료되었습니다. 이 제한은 서버 관리자 또는 네트워크 정책에 의해 설정됩니다.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_UnableToReconnectToRemoteSession
data.value: 원격 세션에 다시 연결할 수 없습니다.

data.name: DeleteGroupMessage
data.value: 선택한 그룹 및 이 그룹 내의 모든 프로필이 영구적으로 삭제됩니다.

data.name: Library_log4net_Description
data.value: log4net is a tool to help the programmer output log statements to a variety of output targets.

data.name: DeleteAWSProfileMessage
data.value:
The selected AWS profile is permanently deleted.
The profile is not removed from the ~\.aws\credentials file.

data.name: SyncAllEC2InstancesFromAWS
data.value: Synchronize all EC2 instances from AWS

data.name: SyncGroupEC2InstancesFromAWS
data.value: Synchronize group EC2 instances from AWS

data.name: HelpMessage_AWSSessionManagerProfilesAndRegionsToSync
data.value: To synchronize EC2 instances from AWS, the AWS CLI must be configured on the system. The EC2 instances can be queried for multiple AWS accounts (profiles) and multiple regions. To do this, the profile stored in the file "~/.aws/credentials" must be configured along with the region to query.

data.name: Library_AWSSDKdotEC2_Description
data.value: AWS SDK for .NET to work with Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) in Amazon Web Services (AWS).

data.name: HelpMessage_AWSSessionManagerProfile
data.value:
Profile which is used by manually created profiles to connect to an EC2 instance via AWS CLI.
If not set, the default AWS CLI settings are used.

data.name: HelpMessage_AWSSessionManagerRegion
data.value:
Region which is used by manually created profiles to connect to an EC2 instance via AWS CLI .
If not set, the default AWS CLI settings are used.

data.name: HelpMessage_AWSCLIDefaultsAreUsedIfNotSet
data.value: If not set, the default AWS CLI settings are used.

data.name: SyncOnlyRunningEC2InstancesFromAWS
data.value: Synchronize only running EC2 instances from AWS

data.name: AnAWSRegionNamedXDoesNotExist
data.value: An AWS region named "{0}" does not exist!

data.name: AWSCLIv2IsNotInstalled
data.value: AWS CLI v2 is not installed!

data.name: AWSSessionManagerPluginIsInstalled
data.value: AWS Session Manager Plugin is installed!

data.name: AWSSessionManagerPluginIsNotInstalled
data.value: AWS Session Manager Plugin is not installed!

data.name: PowerShellConsoleColorCanBeChangedUnderSettingsGeneralApperance
data.value: The color of the PowerShell console can be changed to the application theme under Settings > General > Appearance

data.name: HelpMessage_ApplyThemeToPowerShellConsole
data.value:
If you enable this option, the default PowerShell console settings in the registry under HKCU:\Console are overridden so that the PowerShell console window matches the application theme. This is a global system setting that may affect the appearance of the normal PowerShell window.
Only the PowerShell consoles configured in the PowerShell and AWS Session Manager settings are modified. Both Windows PowerShell and PWSH (PowerShell 7 and higher) are supported.
Click in the upper right corner on the help / documentation button (left of the minimize button) or navigate to https://borntoberoot.net/NETworkManager/Documentation/Settings/Appearance for more details. Here are the values documented which will be adjusted.
If the option is disabled again, the values are no longer modified. However, the original values are NOT restored.

data.name: InputDoesNotContainAnyText
data.value: Input does not contain any text!

data.name: EnterANumberAndSelectAUnitToCalculateTheUnitsDots
data.value: Enter a number and select a unit to calculate the units...

data.name: ResolveIPAddressForThisHost
data.value: Resolve IP address for this host (IPv4 is preferred)

data.name: NoValidPowerShellPath
data.value: A valid path to PowerShell should end with "pwsh.exe" or "powershell.exe"!

data.name: NoValidPuTTYPath
data.value: A valid path to PuTTY should end with "PuTTY.exe"!

data.name: NoValidTigerVNCPath
data.value: A valid path to TigerVNC should end with "vncviewer-*.exe" or "vncviewer64-*.exe"!

data.name: Library_nulastudioNetBeauty_Description
data.value: Move a .NET Framework/.NET Core app runtime components and dependencies into a sub-directory and make it beauty.

data.name: AddATabToPerformASNTPLookup
data.value: Add a tab to perform a SNTP lookup...

data.name: HelpMessage_CustomPublicIPv6AddressAPI
data.value: URL to a web service that can be reached via http or https and returns an IPv6 address like "xxxx:xx:xxx::xx" as response.

data.name: DeleteSNTPServerMessage
data.value: The selected SNTP server will be deleted permanently.

data.name: SNTPServerWithThisNameAlreadyExists
data.value: An SNTP server with this name already exists!

data.name: EnterValidHostnameOrIPAddress
data.value: Enter a valid hostname (like "server-01" or "example.com") or a valid IP address (like 192.168.178.1)!

data.name: EnterMasterPasswordToUnlockProfile
data.value: Enter master password to unlock the profile file:

data.name: SettingsAreResetAndApplicationWillBeRestartedMessage
data.value: The settings will be reset and the application will be restarted afterwards!

data.name: HelpMessage_ThreadPoolAdditionalMinThreads
data.value:
This setting specifies the minimum number of threads that will be created from the application's ThreadPool on demand. This can improve the performance for example of the IP scanner or port scanner.
The value is added to the default min. threads (number of CPU threads). The value 0 leaves the default settings. If the value is higher than the default max. threads of the ThreadPool, this value is used.
If the value is too high, performance problems may occur.
Changes to this value will take effect after the application is restarted. Whether the value was set successfully can be seen in the log file under %LocalAppData%\NETworkManager\NETworkManager.log

data.name: MaxThreadsOnlyGoToSettingsGeneralGeneral
data.value: These settings only change the maximum number of concurrently executed threads per host/port scan. Go to Settings > General > General to adjust the (min) threads of the application.

data.name: CouldNotFindApplicationXXXMessage
data.value: Could not find the application "{0}". Maybe the application was hidden in the settings?

data.name: WarnMessage_MultipleInstances
data.value: Enabling this setting is not recommended. Multiple instances of the application share the same settings and profile files. The last instance to be closed may overwrite changes made by other instances.

data.name: ShareGatewayCredentialsWithRemoteComputer
data.value: Share Gateway credentials with remote computer

data.name: RemoteDesktopGatewayServerLogonMethod_Smartcard
data.value: Smart card or Windows Hello for Business

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331661
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server is temporarily unavailable. Try reconnecting later or contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331651
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer due to one of the following reasons: 1) The requested Remote Desktop Gateway server address and the server SSL certificate subject name do not match. 2) The certificate is expired or revoked. 3) The certificate root authority does not trust the certificate. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331653
data.value: This computer can't verify the identity of the RD Gateway "". It's not safe to connect to servers that can't be identified. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331654
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server address requested and the certificate subject name do not match. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331655
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server's certificate has expired or has been revoked. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331657
data.value: An error occurred while sending data to the Remote Desktop Gateway server. The server is temporarily unavailable or a network connection is down. Try again later, or contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331658
data.value: An error occurred while receiving data from the Remote Desktop Gateway server. Either the server is temporarily unavailable or a network connection is down. Try again later, or contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331660
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server address is unreachable or incorrect. Type a valid Remote Desktop Gateway server address.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331663
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server is running low on server resources and is temporarily unavailable. Try reconnecting later or contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331672
data.value: The Remote Desktop Gateway server has ended the connection. Try reconnecting later or contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331673
data.value: The Remote Desktop Gateway server administrator has ended the connection. Try reconnecting later or contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331675
data.value: Remote Desktop can't connect to the remote computer "" for one of these reasons: 1) Your user account is not listed in the RD Gateway's permission list 2) You might have specified the remote computer in NetBIOS format (for example, computer1), but the RD Gateway is expecting an FQDN or IP address format (for example, computer1.fabrikam.com or 157.60.0.1). Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331676
data.value: Remote Desktop can't connect to the remote computer "" for one of these reasons: 1) Your user account is not authorized to access the RD Gateway "" 2) Your computer is not authorized to access the RD Gateway "" 3) You are using an incompatible authentication method (for example, the RD Gateway might be expecting a smart card but you provided a password) Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331679
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because your network administrator has restricted access to this RD Gateway server. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331680
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the web proxy server requires authentication. To allow unauthenticated traffic to an RD Gateway server through your web proxy server, contact your network administrator.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331682
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server reached its maximum allowed connections. Try reconnecting later or contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331683
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server does not support the request. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331684
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the client does not support one of the Remote Desktop Gateway's capabilities. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331685
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server and this computer are incompatible. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331688
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because no certificate was configured to use at the Remote Desktop Gateway server. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331689
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the RD Gateway server that you are trying to connect to is not allowed by your computer administrator. If you are the administrator, add this Remote Desktop Gateway server name to the trusted Remote Desktop Gateway server list on your computer and then try connecting again.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331690
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because your computer or device did not meet the Network Access Protection requirements set by your network administrator, for one of the following reasons: 1) The Remote Desktop Gateway server name and the server's public key certificate subject name do not match. 2) The certificate has expired or has been revoked. 3) The certificate root authority does not trust the certificate. 4) The certificate key extension does not support encryption. 5) Your computer cannot verify the certificate revocation list. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331691
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because a user name and password are required to authenticate to the Remote Desktop Gateway server instead of smart card credentials.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331692
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because smart card credentials are required to authenticate to the Remote Desktop Gateway server instead of a user name and password.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331700
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because an invalid cookie was sent to the Remote Desktop Gateway server. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331701
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the cookie was rejected by the Remote Desktop Gateway server. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331703
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway server is expecting an authentication method different from the one attempted. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331704
data.value: The RD Gateway connection ended because periodic user authentication failed. Try reconnecting with a correct user name and password. If the reconnection fails, contact your network administrator for further assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331705
data.value: The RD Gateway connection ended because periodic user authorization failed. Try reconnecting with a correct user name and password. If the reconnection fails, contact your network administrator for further assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331707
data.value: Your computer can't connect to the remote computer because the Remote Desktop Gateway and the remote computer are unable to exchange policies. This could happen due to one of the following reasons: 1. The remote computer is not capable of exchanging policies with the Remote Desktop Gateway. 2. The remote computer's configuration does not permit a new connection. 3. The connection between the Remote Desktop Gateway and the remote computer ended. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.name: RemoteDesktopDisconnectReason_50331713
data.value: The RD Gateway connection ended because periodic user authorization failed. Your computer or device didn't pass the Network Access Protection (NAP) requirements set by your network administrator. Contact your network administrator for assistance.

data.value: Error while scanning WiFi adapter "{0}" with error: "{1}"

data.value: Access to the network has been revoked

data.value: The selected OID profile will be deleted permanently.

data.value: The settings on this page contain errors. Correct them to be able to save.

data.name: HelpMessage_PuTTYHostkey
data.value: SSH hostkey to use for the connection (like "71:b8:f2:6e..."). Only available if the mode is "SSH".

data.name: HelpMessage_PuTTYPrivateKeyFile
data.value: Full path to the private key file (like "C:\Users\BornToBeRoot\SSH\private_key.ppk"). Only available if the mode is "SSH".

data.name: HelpMessage_PuTTYUsername
data.value: Username that will be passed into the PuTTY session. Only available if the mode is "SSH", "Telnet" or "Rlogin".

data.name: SNMPV3ErrorCode_AuthenticationFailed
data.value: Authentication failure (incorrect password, community or key).

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_NoError
data.value: The operation was successful without any errors.

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_TooBig
data.value: The response to your request was too large to fit into a single response!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_NoSuchName
data.value: The requested OID could not be found!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_BadValue
data.value: A read-write or write-only object was set to an inconsistent value!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_ReadOnly
data.value: The requested OID does not exist and is not writable!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_GenError
data.value: An error occurred for which no specific message is available!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_NoAccess
data.value: The requested object is not accessible for modification!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_WrongType
data.value: The object was set to an incompatible data type!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_WrongLength
data.value: The value assigned to the object exceeds its maximum length!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_WrongEncoding
data.value: The encoding used for the object is incorrect!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_WrongValue
data.value: The value assigned to the object is not a valid choice!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_NoCreation
data.value: The requested object does not exist and cannot be created!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_InconsistentValue
data.value: The MIB variable is currently in an inconsistent state and cannot be modified!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_ResourceUnavailable
data.value: There are no available system resources to perform the requested operation!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_CommitFailed
data.value: An error occurred during the set operation!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_UndoFailed
data.value: A set operation failed, and previous changes could not be rolled back!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_AuthorizationError
data.value: Authentication failed. Please check the community string!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_NotWritable
data.value: The requested object is not writable and cannot be modified!

data.name: SNMPErrorCode_InconsistentName
data.value: The object's state is inconsistent, preventing the set operation!

data.name: CannotSetHostWhileRunningMessage
data.value: Host cannot be set while other hosts are being added. Please wait until the process is complete and try again.
